title: Kitchen Aid Logo What font is it?
content: Hey can anyone tell me what font the Kitchen Aid logo is?
author: Kara King

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131027091643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/deleka_logo_6297.gif)

I don't know why, but my instinct is custom, based on some of the forms in [Gill Sans Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131027091643/http:/www.identifont.com/samples/adobe/GillSansUltraBold.gif).
